What is the difference between lenovo k5 plus and redmi 3s prime?

major differences-
1) redmi 3s prime supports HD display ( 720 x 1280 pixels )(~294 ppi pixel density) , whereas Lenovo K5 plus supports  full HD display (1080 x 1920 pixels (~441 ppi pixel density))
2)redmi 3s prime supports internal memory of 32gb with 3gb RAM, Lenovo K5 plus supports internal memory of 16gb with 2 gb RAM
3)redmi 3s prime has non removable 4100 mah batery , lenovo has removable 2750  mah battery
4)redmi has fingerprint  sensor . lenovo doesnt have fingerprint sensor
5)lenovo has dedicated memory card slot (upto 32gb). redmi uses SIM2 slot for memory card
